author: Staff Reporter
text: Professor Ronald C. Petersen of Mayo Clinic, a world expert on brain ageing and memory loss, will deliver the 36th TS Srinivasan Oration, organised by NIMHANS, Bengaluru, and NEUROKRISH, Chennai, on February 14, here. The subject of the oration is ‘The Forgetful Brain.’ Those interested may contact 2435 3079 / 2435 7194 or info@marundeshwara.com
title: Talk on ‘The Forgetful Brain’
